title: Nmap Flags
description:
Match these nmap flags to their function:

-sS : SYN scan (stealth)
-sV : Version detection
-sC : Default scripts
-O  : OS detection
-A  : Aggressive (combines -sV -sC -O --traceroute)
-p- : Scan all 65535 ports

What nmap flag would you use to scan ALL TCP ports (not just the top 1000)?

Submit as: flag{nmap_flag} (include the dash)
hints: By default, nmap only scans the top 1000 most common ports
The -p flag specifies port ranges, and a special shorthand scans all ports
